DOC.brief_summary: In study 60 people medically unexplained physical symptom ( MUPS ) receive either 6-session resilience skill build intervention provide fully online weekly computerize journaling assignment . Both program complete home . Participants complete questionnaire intervention change symptom , mood satisfaction life assess .
DOC.brief_title: A Computer-Based Intervention Medically Unexplained Physical Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: SUBJECTS : Sixty patient age 18 80 recruit primary care clinic affiliate University Medicine Dentistry New Jersey - Robert Wood Johnson Medical School ( UMDNJ-RWJMS ) . Qualified patient primary care patient meet following inclusion exclusion criterion : Patients age 18 75 seek medical care physical symptom ( i.e. , persistent fatigue , pain complaint , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular musculoskeletal symptom ) . No major medical illness explain symptom ( ) find detailed physical laboratory assessment . Patients common disorder hypertension , asthma , diabetes , low back strain , etc. , include opinion physician present physical symptom due underlie disorder . In order enter study , patient must meet criterion least 4 medically unexplained symptom 42 somatic symptom list Composite International Diagnostic Interview ( CIDI ) rat currently present male least 6 symptom female ( Escobar 's abridged criterion ) . Patients without ready access computer Internet exclude participate . Also exclude individual life threaten medical illness , communicative disorder , lack fluency English , illiteracy , major psychiatric condition include psychosis , bipolar disorder , alcohol drug abuse . Patients require add medication regimen study period ( approximately 6 week ) . BASELINE ASSESSMENT . After read signing informed consent , participant complete baseline assessment consist questionnaire measure deliver structure interview . Questionnaires include Health Assessment Questionnaire ( HAQ ) , Quick Inventory Depressive Symptomatology ( QIDS ) , PRIME-MD Somatic Symptoms Scale ( SSS ) , Positive Negative Affect Scale ( PANAS ) , Satisfaction Life Scale ( SWLS ) , demographic questionnaire . The structured interview consist Composite International Diagnostic Interview ( CIDI ) . PROCEDURES : Subjects randomize one two group . The psychological resilience build group 's exercise post state-of-the-art website know `` Authentic Happiness '' . Participants provide web address show access site Research Portal 6 exercise focus ongoing study find . The journaling group instruct write weekly 60-minutes use plan use time slightly vary time frame : 1 ) previous 24 hour , 2 ) previous week , 3 ) previous year , 4 ) next 24 hour , 5 ) next week 6 ) next year . The journaling participant use `` PowerJournal '' . PowerJournal 0.2 Windows downloadable program ; download installed computer , need Internet connection . This simple word-processing program , similar style Microsoft Word . FOLLOW UP ASSESSMENT . After intervention complete , participant send questionnaire ( plus Follow-Up Form ) use pre-intervention battery mail ask return questionnaire self-addressed , stamp envelope include . We estimate questionnaire take 30 minute complete . This conclude participation study .
